Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Tankkor, Inferno, Paralysis, and Aerostreak send a squad of missles and 
dischrges at the Nightmares, giving Hell Beast and Aracnia a chance to get 
away.
       "Idiots. Kill them!" Hell Beast commands, as he, and the other bots 
begin to massacre the Nightmares.

       "Excellent. We have them on the run. Now we just have to sweep those 
Nightmares out of the way." Megatron smiles. "Nighteyes, Aquarious, go and 
assist them."

       Ominous Primes watched Hell Beast get jumped. It was a nice sight to 
see his archenemy in such agony.
       "I do believe theyre in my old base...." He murmured to himself. 

       Rampage climed on shore, whick was an iceburg. He didnt see Demise 
anywhere, but at least he was somewhat ok. He raised his grappling hook, and 
climed back up the cliff. Seeing the Nightmares attacking, he joined his team 
in the slaughter.

--part1_a9.f1ec3ff.276ebc7a_boundary
